turns.content: Write two paragraphs on what happens next: When it became known that Ego Must was also implicated in the Zucker & Tucker enterprise Polar Pursuits, it became crystal clear to almost everyone that the corporate hijacking of the Internet needed to be unravelled.

The revelation of Ego Must's involvement in Polar Pursuits sent shockwaves throughout the corporate and tech communities. The Zucker & Tucker enterprise had already been under investigation for their dubious business practices, and Ego Must's involvement only added fuel to the fire. As more details emerged about the extent of their involvement, it became clear that the hijacking of the internet was a much larger problem than anyone had initially suspected.

With public outrage at an all-time high, government agencies and regulatory bodies began to take action. Congressional hearings were held to investigate the role of big tech in the hijacking of the internet, and numerous lawsuits were filed against the companies involved. As more evidence came to light, the public became increasingly aware of the dangers of unregulated corporate influence over the internet. In the end, the unraveling of the Polar Pursuits enterprise marked a turning point in the fight for a free and open internet, and sparked a renewed push for stronger regulations to prevent similar abuses in the future.
